plot: A man feels alienated from his wife because of her quirky nature. Instead he finds himself falling in love with another woman.
title: Sarangbona ganghan geot
plot_es: A man feels alienated from his wife because of her quirky nature. Instead he finds himself falling in love with another woman.
plot_en: A man feels alienated from his wife because of her quirky nature. Instead he finds himself falling in love with another woman.
